column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I caught one of my favorite overheard exchanges of recent years in a modern sculpture room at the Art Institute of Chicago. "Am I allowed to sit here?" asked a boy of his father. "No
column2: said the father. That is art." The father paused for a second then added
column3: "That artist just died." I sympathized with the son. I'm not that knowledgeable about art either
